senses.sense_definition: A basic drum pattern consisting of four strokes played in a specific alternating sequence, such as right-left-right-right or left-right-left-left.

examples.text: The student spent hours mastering the <w>paradiddle</w> on his snare drum.
A single <w>paradiddle</w> is one of the essential rudiments every drummer must learn.

senses.sense_definition: To play the specific four-beat drum pattern known as a paradiddle.

examples.text: He nervously <w>paradiddled</w> his fingers on the desk during the exam.
The percussionist <w>paradiddled</w> rapidly across the tom-toms during the solo.
